body_html: Would you mind telling me how do you quantize the test model? As in my case, I try to train a model for mnist classification dataset, I have followed the quantization tool provided by Tensorflow, the result predicted by the quantized model runned in PC is correct, however, when runned in my Mobile phone with a Snapdragon 820 devices, it got different and wrong predict score. Thanks. @satok16
